comment.author: 46886728@N00
comment._content:
I can read MASAKATA SE "N" GOKU.
Sengoku is a common family name in Japan.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Viscount Masakata Sengoku is listed as a cabinet member, Minister of Communications, in 1910s Japan, here: books.google.com/books?id=fglXAAAAMAAJ&lpg=PA184&... Looks like his eldest son married the Emperor's granddaughter in 1893: books.google.com/books?id=52wxAQAAMAAJ&lpg=PA553&...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Masahiro Makino: Thanks for pointing out the typo in Makino's name.  We'll correct the description next time we update.
